statement_text: "I've been a student of this virus [H5N1]. And I surely have been amazed at how it's [it] changed over the course of the last 20-some years, but at the same time, you know, I'm looking for evidence that it [it] is likely to become a virus infecting humans and then transmitted by humans to other humans.
